snippet: Not long after August Watkins reported the theft of his car, he was identified by the authorities as the suspect in a wave of robberies in Queens and Brooklyn.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column relates story of August Watkins of Queens, who has been arrested and charged for one hold-up but is suspected in wave of commercial robberies around Brooklyn and Queens; notes Watkins may have reported his car stolen in attempt to provide alibi for at least one crime.
lead_paragraph: Not long after August Watkins reported the theft of his car, he was identified by the authorities as the suspect in a wave of robberies in Queens and Brooklyn.

headline.print_headline: He Said His Car Had Been Stolen; the Police Say He Was Doing the Stealing
headline.main: He Said His Car Had Been Stolen; the Police Say He Was Doing the Stealing
